original_title: PGS - Intuition is your Personal Guidance System
overview: The film documents Bill Bennett's journey to find the source of a mysterious voice which saved his life. It features some of the world's leading experts on intuition spanning the fields of science, religion, and spirituality.
tagline: “Making this movie changed my life – Watching it could change yours…”
title: PGS - Intuition is your Personal Guidance System
